summary: Project to implement a vendor registration flow/UI per the attached specification document.

existing_features.title: Update the existing vendor registration flow (UI + backend) to match the fields, steps, validations, and success/error states defined in the attached vendor registration specification document (including any additional vendor details beyond vendor name, mobile number, and GST).

Update the Vendors page and vendor listing UI to display vendor information according to the attached document (fields shown, formatting, and any status/labels), and ensure list refreshes appropriately after a successful registration.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement vendor registration flow/UI as specified in the attached document

Ensure the backend vendor data model and APIs support the attached documentâ€™s vendor registration requirements, including persisting all required vendor attributes and enforcing any constraints/uniqueness rules specified in the document.
If the attached document requires changes to persisted vendor state (new fields or altered types), add a conditional Motoko state migration to preserve existing vendor/OTP data across upgrades.
